rules_text:
When Meadow Songstress enters, conjure three cards named Meadow Songstress and shuffle them into your main library.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, if it shares a name with one or more other creatures you control, draw a card.
notes:
!script "<s><l>Conjure three Meadow Songstress</l><f>/spawnx3 Meadow Songstress Reminder 101</f></s>","r"
!exportname Meadow Songstress Reminder
Totally replaced [Collector number 86] Midwoods Ambush
